website_summaries.verdict: Chunky soles are on trend, making the Puma Blaze of Glory Sock Core relevant even if takes the design of a 90s shoe. The quality combined with trendy and tonal treatments is worth the potential buyer’s bucks. It’s a great lifestyle shoe that matches different outfits.
pros: The neoprene sock of the Puma Blaze of Glory Sock Core gives a comfortable fit
Its chunky outsole makes it a trendy sneaker
A few reviewers like how the shoe looks
A video reviewer is impressed with the suede construction which appears luxurious
A handful of buyers are satisfied with the quality of the B.O.G Sock Core
A couple of reviewers comment that the black colorway looks like a dress shoe
cons: Some Puma Blaze of Glory Sock Core owners complain about getting blisters in the heel area
A few people notice that this kick feels tight on foot

customer_reviews.title: He said it's comfy and cool. My husband usually wears 9
customer_reviews.text: Choose one size bigger! I bought this for my husband and he loves it! He said it's comfy and cool. My husband usually wears 9.5. But sock core runs small. Fortunately I got 10.5 for him and fits perfectly. One size up!
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for..
customer_reviews.text: Definitely the redout colorway will turn some heads but the shoes are not comfortable in the heel area, kept getting unnecessary rubbing to the point where I refuse to wear them due to blisters... I recommend adidas NEO cloudfoam shoes. Twice the price around 80 bucks with same redout colorway but definitely worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Brad Bayes

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic find
customer_reviews.text: I am a girl and wear 6.5. After reading reviews and simply looking at the tapered top design I desided to order the size up, so I ordered men's US 6. It was a right guess. I was able add orthopedic half soles for more joy from walking.The top is very flexible reminds me of surfing neoprene wetsuit material. Suede front and sides are a bit more fuzzy velvety than expected. Love em.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksa

customer_reviews.title: I like the look
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I like the look. I bought them because I saw Suga from BTS wearing them and thought they looked cool. Cons: They can be uncomfortably tight due to the sock inside. Adjust the laces and break them in! 4/5 Stars! ☆☆☆☆
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Bankston

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I like this shoes. It's pretty comfortable and good fit for my feet. I love this color and I feel like famous in this shoes)))) It's definitely on of the best sneakers ever from PUMA
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sneakers look real koo they seem like its tight ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sneakers look real koo they seem like its tight but not actualy tight its just the inner sock does as a water sock similar but they fit perfect for thise who r clusterphobics doesnt hurt to get a half size lager or evwn a whole size larger they will fit both way i got 11.5 1 color and 12 another they fit is almost the same but shoes are wonderfully aweaome
customer_reviews.author: ><>A2J4LIFE<><

customer_reviews.title: Good sneaker a bit tight but that is due to ...
customer_reviews.text: Good sneaker a bit tight but that is due to the sock. It looks like it will break in. Excellent quality on the material. Color is what I wanted and was shown. Going to get a lot of exercise putting them on until I get a method to do so. But I'm satisfied a little tight at the ball of the feet.
customer_reviews.author: augustusmax

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: They are so pretty. It looked the same as the ones as Jimin wore in the commercial!
customer_reviews.author: No_one

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent pair of sneakers, style and comfort, and the price was best i found online.
customer_reviews.author: Virawood Vilayvanh

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: For the price they are a steal! BUT they are deffintly not wight. Hey look more of an eggshell cream .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought them!
customer_reviews.text: I’m super impressed with the quality of these shoes, they look cool and just like pictured. Also, super fast delivery even though it was the holidays. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and runs smooth
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and runs smooth. Only downside was the sizes are smaller in comparission to other otrher models. Buy 1 size bigger is better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe.... Feels good when i walk but it's just too tight to wear for longs period of time. i should have got a half size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Drop kick

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Quality
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is beautiful, although they fit small, this is a excellent buy, may consider going up a size but im afraid that may change how great the shoe looks on my feet
customer_reviews.author: Jason Smith

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality shoes but half a size smaller. The color is more pink than red
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: nice looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: needed new shoes for work and these are great might buy another pair i would recommend added some shouls pads to put inside the shoe for extra comfort if your on your feet all day.
customer_reviews.author: Shameal

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, but a bit small
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 7.5 in women, so I went with the conversation measurement and bought a 6 in men size. The shoes are awesome but a little narrow in the front. So I am going to return them and get a 6.5 instead.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana A. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good product, it's a good idea to spray some ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product, it's a good idea to spray some protection on the swede part of the shoe, being white they can easealy get dirty
customer_reviews.author: Armando

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like the style...But the shoes were small and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Do they come in white.
customer_reviews.text: Got a lot friends asking what they were and if they came in white. I love them and they're very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Chas. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Order half a size smaller. Perfect, Great value shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear us10 with my sneakers and I ordered us 10.5, and it fits perfectly! It looks even better than photo. It's super comfortable to be a daily shoe, and easy to match with any outfits. It's a great shoes! I don't usually leave reviews but honestly I read most of the reviews and rating before I buy anything on amazon so I feel like I should give back to the community. Puma is definitely one of those underrated shoes you could get here for a cheaper price! Love them. Might get another color soon.
customer_reviews.author: Ducati

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice stylish shoes but make sure to wear socks or else you WILL get blisters
customer_reviews.author: Gerard

customer_reviews.title: Puma has quality products
customer_reviews.text: puma is a great product. I really enjoy these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordered another one 1/2 size up, still too small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my normal size which was too small. Ordered another one 1/2 size up, still too small. It's not prime, I have to pay for return shipping. I decided to keep the second one just for design and color, but GOOD BYE PUMA! I'll not buy another PUMA. They are either too small or too big!
customer_reviews.author: blackmarkedsign

customer_reviews.title: This is a great sneaker, personally worn with joggers or jeans
customer_reviews.text: The sock lining was a bit loose, I thought it would be more snug, other than that. This is a great sneaker, personally worn with joggers or jeans.
customer_reviews.author: J.Narushima

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the Neoprene Booty
customer_reviews.text: Sharp looking shoes. Unfortunately, I ended up returning them as I wasn't too thrilled with the neoprene interior (just like a little boot). My fault for not dwelling on the description too long. Might be good for other people, but I did not like the feel or the effort required to get these shoes on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: spiker_man

customer_reviews.title: the most important comfortable. I liked them a lot
customer_reviews.text: A well dine and cheap product. But, the most important comfortable. I liked them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great shoe for the right price. Once you get them, everybody will look at you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's hard  too wear these shoes,too small !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I often wear US10.5 shoes, but these shoes are too small, it's impossible to wear,too narrow and small, anyone want to buy pls buy a half large size at least. Seriously, i am angry now... The shoes factory are irresponsible, it's too small !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: PUMA Mens BOG Sock CORE-M Bog Sock Core
product_meta.description: Puma Blaze of Glory Sock Core Running Shoes
feature_bullets: Lace-up sneaker featuring stretchy Bog sock core for comfortable, close fit
